title: FS: Addie Joss (hands at chest) PSA 4 SCap 350/25, the only one!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: Addie Joss (hands at chest) PSA 4 SCap 350/25, the only one!
posts.post_content: Only one other card shows of all grades on the PSA Population report! That is how rare this back is (especially for a HOFer). Card has very large white borders, centered nicely. Pics coming soon, $675....
